games.title: Nicktoons & The Dice of Destiny

projects.title: Unreal Learning Playground
projects.description: Personal project focused on experimenting with and learning new techniques in Unreal Engine.

projects.title: Cowboy Chase
projects.description: Project created during the Samsung Ocean Unity 3D course. A chase game where the player controls a cowboy who collects coins while escaping from a police officer.

projects.description: Plugin for creating and managing timers easily using replicated tag-based systems.

projects.title: Big Head Kitchen

projects.title: Bubble Express
projects.description: A challenging delivery game where couriers are bubbles that must avoid obstacles to complete their deliveries, created during Global Game Jam 2024.
